data-chronos-domain="http://livecentreps-prod.eu-west-1.elasticbeanstalk.com/" data-section-view><div class="live-event-entries"><h2 class="section-theme-highlight publication-font"><a href="http://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/news/greater-manchester-news/live-manchester-breaking-news-saturday-13561067"> live <span>breaking news blog</span></a></h2><div class="live-event-entry" id="844322" data-post-time="1504363121191" data-last-modified-time="1504363247318"><time class="section-theme">15:38</time><h3> <a href="http://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/news/greater-manchester-news/live-manchester-breaking-news-saturday-13561067">Campaign to stop commuters parking in city centre streets</a></h3><div class="entry-content"><figure class="in-article-image live-event-image"><div class="outer"><div class="mod-image" data-mod="image"><img src="http://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article9844939.ece/ALTERNATES/s338b/JS69946154.jpg" alt="" content="http://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/incoming/article9844939.ece/ALTERNATES/s338b/JS69946154.jpg"></div></div></figure><p>Campaigners say parking restrictions around residential areas of the city centre, particularly in Ancoats, need to be improved. </p></div></div><div class="live-event-entry" id="844043" data-post-time="1504355320282" data-last-modified-time="1504355320282"><time class="section-theme">13:28</time><h3> <a href="http://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/news/greater-manchester-news/live-manchester-breaking-news-saturday-13561067">Car fire on M56 causing today.</p></div></div><div class="live-event-entry" id="843984" data-post-time="1504350901672" data-last-modified-time="1504350932331"><time class="section-theme">12:15</time><h3> <a
